mapper.select: select t.TUTOR_ID, t.NAME as tutor_name,email,c.COURSE_ID, c.name,description,start_date,end_date from tutors t left outer join addresses a on t.ADDR_ID=a.ADDR_ID left outer join courses c on T.TUTOR_ID=c.TUTOR_ID where t.TUTOR_ID=#{tutorId};
mapper.insert: insert into tutors (tutor_id, name, email, phone,gender) values(#{tutorId}, #{name},#{email},#{phone},#{gender})
